outputs.output_descr: The sub-project I (BRA/00/011) aims to promote knowledge, absorption and application of principles of Agenda 21 and sustainable development by supporting the work of the Policy Commission on Sustainable Development and Agenda 21 and promoting the definition of Local Agenda.

project_descr: Apoio às Políticas Públicas na Área Ambiental - Subprojeto I
project_title: BRA/00/011 - Public Policies at the Environmental Area
